title: I made lot of mistakes & cleanliness issues in prayers in past, must I make them up? assim al hakeem
transcript: uh earlier uh uh like one year ago I did not had much knowledge about Islam so I prayed in incontinence without cleaning myself I prayed when the shadow passes the object I prayed behind some imams who do mistakes in FAA for example my cousin or a friend so do I have have to repeat these prayers and I do not have a account of it the answer is no you don't have to repeat these prayers because one there's so many two you've done this out of ignorance three the time is gone so alhamdulillah repent to Allah ask him for forgiveness and move on with your life uh we have
